name: Rickshaw Redemption - Heritage Game Jam 2020
description:
Play as a not-so-knowledgeable rickshaw runner who has to quickly learn about his heritage to answer the questions from tourists!

Made in Unity for the Singapore Heritage Game Jam 2020.

Alternate between 'A' and 'D' keys to pedal your rickshaw and 'Space' to slow down.

Circle your mouse around keywords to collect them and try not to panic when the tourist asks you a question.
